abstract: The company’s profits rose for the quarter based on strong PC sales in developing markets and rising demand from corporate customers.
snippet: The company’s profits rose for the quarter based on strong PC sales in developing markets and rising demand from corporate customers.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft on Thursday reported mixed financial results that drove the company’s stock down almost 5 percent in after-hours trading. In a rare shortfall, the company just missed the forecasts of Wall Street analysts, which had been 47 cents a share according to First Call, the financial research service.

headline.main: Microsoft Profits Are Hurt by Big Expenses
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Profits Are Hurt by Big Expenses

abstract: Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.
snippet: Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Like two straight-A students who uncharacteristically fail an exam, the technology titans Google and Microsoft issued quarterly results on Thursday that disappointed investors.

abstract: Bill Miller, the portfolio manager at Legg Mason whose funds hold a large stake in Yahoo, said Friday that he would vote its shares in favor of electing Yahoo’s current board of directors — and not for the rival slate nominated by Mr. Icahn, who wants to sell Yahoo (or part of it) to Microsoft.

lead_paragraph: From Dealbook:Chalk up a major win for Yahoo in its battle with Carl Icahn, the activist investor.
